body.p:
Cynthiana Ky May 24" 1864
Gov Thos E Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir.

Enclosed you will find a petition in behalf of Barzilla Baird, a very poor and worthy citizen of this county. the facts of case are stated in the petition. by granting the pray of your petitioner, you will confer a great good upon Barzilla Baird.

Very Respectfully Yours
John R Smith
Cynthiana Ky.
